meanings.definition: A person in charge of a circus performance, who introduces the acts and keeps order in the ring.
meanings.sent1: The ringmaster welcomed the audience with a big smile.
meanings.sent2: The circus ringmaster announced the next act with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent3: The ringmaster tried to juggle like the clowns but ended up dropping everything.
meanings.sent4: She was the ringmaster of her own destiny, guiding her life with confidence.
meanings.sent5: The ringmaster's top hat and whip made him stand out in the center ring.

meanings.definition: A person who is the leader or organizer of a group or event.
meanings.sent1: As the ringmaster of the project, he assigned tasks to each team member.
meanings.sent2: The event's ringmaster ensured everything ran smoothly behind the scenes.
meanings.sent3: The ringmaster of the party made sure everyone had a good time.
meanings.sent4: She became the ringmaster of the family reunion, coordinating games and activities.
meanings.sent5: The CEO acted as the ringmaster of the company, guiding it towards success.
